channel.title: Comments on: The Cure to release deluxe 3-Disc Disintegration set

item.title: By: Jesse Yani
item.dc:creator: Jesse Yani
item.description:
Disintegration is one of my favs but how could you say 20 yrs of "rehashed rubbish" proceeded. I could listen to the Wish album from start to finish. So the other albums are not up to par but you can still find the true essence of the cure on some of the songs. Here are a few
Underneath the Stars from 4:13 Dream
The Promise from The Cure album
Lost from The Cure album
The Last day of Summer from Bloodflowers
Want from Wild Mood Swings
Strange Attraction from Wild Mood Swings
Bare from Wild Mood Swings
item.content:encoded:
Disintegration is one of my favs but how could you say 20 yrs of “rehashed rubbish” proceeded. I could listen to the Wish album from start to finish. So the other albums are not up to par but you can still find the true essence of the cure on some of the songs. Here are a few

Underneath the Stars from 4:13 Dream

The Promise from The Cure album

Lost from The Cure album

The Last day of Summer from Bloodflowers

Want from Wild Mood Swings

Strange Attraction from Wild Mood Swings

Bare from Wild Mood Swings

item.title: By: Mult Lingue
item.dc:creator: Mult Lingue
item.description: I am looking forward to hearing the previously unreleased live material from the concert which became Entreat. However, I am disappointed that this 3 disc set is not actually a complete treatment of Disintegration. Notably missing are the original versions of B-sides such as Out of Mind, Babble, 2 Late, and Fear of Ghosts. The demos and outtakes are of interest, but why not include the original versions too?
item.content:encoded: I am looking forward to hearing the previously unreleased live material from the concert which became Entreat. However, I am disappointed that this 3 disc set is not actually a complete treatment of Disintegration. Notably missing are the original versions of B-sides such as Out of Mind, Babble, 2 Late, and Fear of Ghosts. The demos and outtakes are of interest, but why not include the original versions too?

item.title: By: Eric Greenwood
item.dc:creator: Eric Greenwood
item.description: i begged my parents to let me go to atlanta on a school night to see the prayer tour in september of 1989. they did not cave. so, as consolation, they got me tickets to a wish-era show for my high school graduation. not quite the same.
item.content:encoded: i begged my parents to let me go to atlanta on a school night to see the prayer tour in september of 1989. they did not cave. so, as consolation, they got me tickets to a wish-era show for my high school graduation. not quite the same.

item.title: By: K
item.dc:creator: K
item.description: The Disintegration tour show I saw as a tween changed my life. I'm usually not a fan of these sort of collections, but in this case I am really looking forward to that rarities disc. Thanks for the tip.
item.content:encoded: The Disintegration tour show I saw as a tween changed my life. I’m usually not a fan of these sort of collections, but in this case I am really looking forward to that rarities disc. Thanks for the tip.
